product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life Saral Jeevan Bima is a simple and standard term insurance plan that provides life cover to protect your family financially in case of the policyholder’s unfortunate death.
key_highlights: Life cover up to 40 years policy term
Flexibility to choose Single, Limited or Regular premium payment
Death benefit payable as lump sum
Waiting period of 45 days from risk commencement

features: Standardized Saral Jeevan Bima term plan

core_benefits.details: After completion of 45-day waiting period, Sum Assured on Death is payable to nominee as lump sum.
If death occurs during waiting period, accidental death pays full Sum Assured. Non-accidental death pays only 100% of premiums received (excluding taxes).

premium_types.regular_or_limited: Highest of (a) 10× Annualized Premium, (b) 105% of Total Premiums Paid, (c) Absolute Sum Assured
premium_types.single_premium: Higher of (a) 125% of Single Premium, (b) Absolute Sum Assured

core_benefits.details: No maturity benefit is payable under this policy.

policy_cancellation_value.availability: Applicable only for Single Premium and Limited Premium policies

formula.single_premium: 70% × Single Premium × (Unexpired Policy Term / Original Policy Term)
formula.limited_premium: 70% × Total Premiums Paid × (Unexpired Policy Term / Original Policy Term)

policy_cancellation_value.eligibility: Limited Pay cancellation value only after 2 consecutive full years premiums paid

premium_frequency_change.availability: Allowed at any policy anniversary (limited/regular policies)

rebates_and_discounts.high_sum_assured_rebate: Applied for every additional ₹1 lakh increase above ₹5 lakhs
rebates_and_discounts.female_life_rebate: Female premium rate based on male aged 3 years younger

surrender_value.details: Surrender value is not available under this policy.

must_disclose: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions.
This sales literature gives only salient features. Policy document is the final contract.
compliance_rules.waiting_period_rule: 45-day waiting period applies from commencement of risk (not applicable on revival).

suicide_exclusion.regular_or_limited: If suicide within 12 months → 80% of premiums paid refunded.
suicide_exclusion.single_premium: If suicide within 12 months → 90% of single premium refunded.

compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Income Tax Act amendments. Consult your tax advisor.
compliance_rules.free_look_period: 30 days free look from date of policy receipt.

retrieval_chunks.text: After the 45-day waiting period, Sum Assured on Death is payable to nominee as lump sum.
During first 45 days, accidental death pays full Sum Assured, non-accidental death pays only premiums received.
Entry age is 18–65 years, maturity age up to 70 years, sum assured range ₹5–₹25 Lakhs, policy term up to 40 years.
Cancellation value is available only for single and limited pay policies based on 70% of premiums and unexpired term proportion.
If suicide occurs within 12 months, refund is 80% premiums paid (regular/limited) or 90% single premium.
